text: Anabela Miranda Rodrigues (born 5 December 1953) is a Portuguese politician who was the first female Minister of Internal Administration, having served from 19 November 2014 to 30 October 2015 under Prime Minister Pedro Passos Coelho. Committee on Italian, European and International Criminal Procedure – Ibrerojur (coordinated by Bruna Capparelli). ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Portugal Category:Women government ministers of Portugal Category:People from Coimbra
title: Anabela Rodrigues
